definition: an area in which something acts or operates or has power or control: 'the range of a supersonic jet', move in an orbit
details:
noun
- an area in which something acts or operates or has power or control: 'the range of a supersonic jet'
= synonyms: reach
- the bony cavity in the skull containing the eyeball
= synonyms: eye socket, cranial orbit, orbital cavity
- the usually elliptical path described by one celestial body in its revolution about another
= example: the usually elliptical path described by one celestial body in its revolution about another
= synonyms: celestial orbit
- the path of an electron around the nucleus of an atom
= synonyms: electron orbit
- a particular environment or walk of life
= synonyms: field
verb
- move in an orbit
= example: move in an orbit
= synonyms: orb, revolve
